name: Switch Button Icons and Controls
description:
This pack includes 
- Three styles of buttons prompts
- Files for 50 vector-based button types with black and white varieties  
- Controller graphics for the Pro Controller, Joycons, Handheld Mode, Joycon Grip, Left Joycon, and Right Joycon.
- SVGs and PNGs (Buttons: 128px, 256px, 512px | Screens: 4k)

License:   CC BY 3.0
